CustomField.description: The name of the Salesforce field designated for an external system. This will ensure that when transmitting data from Salesforce to the external system, we adhere to their naming conventions. For instance, while the Salesforce field API name may be custom_field__c, it should be sent as "Custom Field" in the request body.
